name: Adrienne Tichy

what_you_do: Recovery Strategist; collaborates with families affected by addiction to help them heal together Recovery strategist; we guide people who’ve experienced life-altering catastrophes to rebuild and rejoin life on their terms; offer interviews, recovery residences and virtual recovery programs.

jv_history.source_quote: Hope of Recovery highlights first-person stories to affirm that recovery is a process of change through which people ... hope. \nWe thank our partners at Alliance for Positive Health, Champlain Valley
